title: PvP Kernal Patcher not working
body:
Game was working fine yesterday now today it wont load siting an error "pvp kernal patcher not working"

Any fixes for this?

Cheers

replies.body: u right click ur lol icon on srceen page and click ''RUN AS ADMINISTRATOR''  then just press yes and should work :D!!!!!!

> [{quoted}](name=Warglaivez,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=lkxEe5yo,comment-id=,timestamp=2014-12-13T02:12:00.694+0000)
>
> Game was working fine yesterday now today it wont load siting an error "pvp kernal patcher not working"
> 
> Any fixes for this?
> 
> Cheers


> [{quoted}](name=Warglaivez,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=lkxEe5yo,comment-id=,timestamp=2014-12-13T02:12:00.694+0000)
>
> Game was working fine yesterday now today it wont load siting an error "pvp kernal patcher not working"
> 
> Any fixes for this?
> 
> Cheers

Right click on the LOL desktop icon. One of the options should be Troubleshoot Compatibility . Click on that , go through the process (easy and takes less than five minutes). After that it should be sorted.
Try typing lol.launcher.admin.exe in your search bar
I fixed it by going to the league files and running it as admin
No fix that i know of but it might have been the hotfix/stealthpatch they had just done the last day or two.
